pageContent.title: Meeting with Dr. Cardonza – Collecting Information and Determining Next Steps
pageContent.descriptionText: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:16pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px; padding:0 0 0 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Meeting with Dr. Cardonza – Collecting Information and Determining Next Steps</Introtext><welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">"I must be comfortable with a drug’s efficacy and safety profile. Those are the givens. After that, it should have good insurance coverage, be available at a reasonable cost, and shouldn’t be a hassle for my department to prescribe. I won’t begin a new product just to have a new product."</welcomeText>
